verses.name: 1 Peter 4:8
verses.text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:9
verses.text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging.

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:10
verses.text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

verses.name: 1 Peter 4:11
verses.text: If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
